channel.title: this is mitime
channel.description: Recent content on this is mitime

item.title: mi whi
item.description: Recently, when I began working full-time for myself, I suddenly had much more direct control over much more of my time, and I knew I had to figure out how to best organize my time to be productive. Relying on my project management background, I began specifying my goals and their scope, and started to think of breaking them into milestones and scheduling time for them. While this was all necessary, I was still missing something crucial.

item.title: mi guide
item.description: Mitime (pronounced “my time”) is a minimal structure mapped over standard time that describes available time in a day. Mitime is represented by the following format: M.H.N Where: M is the mi (ášƒ ), the most important number in mitime, defining the largest subdivision of the day. By default this is 4. H is the mihour. Like standard hours, mihours are 60 standard minutes in length. By default, there are 4 mihours in every mi.
